      • createChildComment

        @NotNull
T createChildComment(Text text,
                              boolean reopen)
        Creates a child comment and optionally reopens the comment thread, if it is resolved. If the thread is reopened, IPObject.save() is called on the root comment.
        Since:
        3.7.1

        Since:
